name: TotallyNormal PBR Generator
description: Radial Pattern Tiling: Organic Seamless Transitions
changes: Implemented radial pattern-based seamless tiling algorithm
Replaced linear edge blending with organic radial gradient approach
Added distance-based blend weight calculation with cosine and quadratic falloffs
Enhanced pattern creation for more natural, less obvious tiling transitions
Improved edge matching with radial influence zones for better visual continuity
Created organic appearance instead of straight linear blur effects
